This channel doesn't support xampp, we recommend the use of the packages in the repositories.  Is there a particular reason you don't wish to use those?
That's all straight apache stuff.  the apache website has a bunch of info.  You're looking for the "DocumentRoot" directive though.
There should be 'DocumentRoot /var/www' (or something besides /var/www) somewhere in there
ok understand, you wouldn't know where that is?
not in xampp, no. In Ubuntu's apache, it's /etc/apache2/sites-available/*
You could look for it with grep: grep -R DocumentRoot /path/to/xampps/config/directory
/opt/lampp/etc/extra/ is the dir where the .conf file is in
